plot.content:
Plotted live during NFC Lisbon conference on 10 cm square watercolor paper with fountain pen. Fire and ice ink.

This uses a "low poly custom perlin noise" to implement mountains and sky. It is a continuation of Horizon of hope in a more minimalistic way of the small size of the plot.

data.title: [NFC] Lisbon
data.description: Plotted live during NFC Lisbon conference on 10 cm square watercolor paper with fountain pen.
